explanation: [0-0] A person holds a white coffee cup in their left hand and a spoon with chocolate in their right hand. On the table, there is a green ceramic bowl filled with chopped hazelnuts, and in the upper left corner, an open coffee bean bottle with a few beans scattered on the table.

[0-4] The left hand rotates the cup, while the right hand evenly spreads the chocolate from the spoon onto the inner wall of the white cup. Then, the right hand takes a spoonful of chopped hazelnuts and sprinkles them evenly over the chocolate.

[0-4] The left hand rotates the cup, while the right hand evenly spreads the chocolate from the spoon onto the inner wall of the white cup. Then, the right hand takes a spoonful of chopped hazelnuts and sprinkles them evenly over the chocolate.

[4-14] Next, a hand places a portafilter filled with coffee powder onto a machine. Then, a round tool is placed on top of the portafilter. The right hand, holding a needle, stirs the coffee powder and then squats down to remove the round tool. The right hand takes a distributor, places it on the portafilter, rotates it a few times, and removes it. Then, a tamper is taken and pressed down on the portafilter. Finally, the right hand picks up the portafilter and secures it onto the coffee machine.
